name: Cursed Angel: Time Paradox
description:
Cursed Angel is a new time travel and time manipulation strategy game. Game contain multiverse and multiple timelines wait player to explore.



KEY FEATURES

  • Become a super hero, dragon or command legendary legions to kill demons
  • Use the Mask Of Time to freeze time or travel through time.
  • 70+ heroes and legions to unlock.
  • More than 100 choices to decide your fate.
  • Find a genie to grant you a wish.
  • Open world with procedurally-generated content, as well as 9 legend castles to discover and conquer.
  • Raid, capture, and upgrade castles.
  • Hundreds of skills and items to unlock.
  • Many side things to do: fishing, finding treasure, dancing, flirting, training weapons and magic...



- In 3 year i make this game by myself. Game programming, some animation and environment art made by me but i also use a lot of great art and music asset from Unity Asset Store, Mixamo...
- English is not my native language so if i have some mistake please tell me.
- If you have any feedback about my game, please let me know and i will improve it as much as possible.
Hope you like my game!
